newsitem.title: GERMANY: Latest opinion polls on German political parties.
newsitem.headline: Latest opinion polls on German political parties.

text.p: Here are the latest opinion polls tracking national support for Germany's main political parties:
MAY 1997 CDU/CSU SPD FDP Greens PDS
APRIL 1997 CDU/CSU SPD FDP Greens PDS
MARCH 1997 CDU/CSU SPD FDP Greens PDS
FEBRUARY 1997 CDU/CSU SPD FDP Greens PDS
OFFICIAL RESULTS OF THE OCTOBER 16, 1994 GENERAL ELECTION:
* The Forsa poll of May 7 was taken on April 28-May 2 with a sample of 2,004 and tolerance of 2.5 percent.
* The Electoral research Group poll of April 18 was based on a sample of 1,264.
* The Forsa poll of April 17 was taken on April 7-11 with a sample of 2,528 and a tolerance of 2.5 percent.
* The Allensbach poll of April 16 was taken on March 25-April 7.
* The Forsa poll of April 10 was taken on April 4-7 with a sample of 1,006 and a tolerance of three percent.
* Infratest poll of April 9 was taken on April 7 with a sample of 1,013
* Infratest poll of April 4 was taken on April 3 with a sample of 1,000
* Forsa's April 3 poll was taken March 24-27 with a sample of 2,001 and tolerance of 2.5 percent.
Dates indicate the day of a poll's publication.
Elect Res = Electoral Research Group (Forschungsgruppe Wahlen)
